document.full_text: mattias ritola scored twice, dwayne roloson made 30 saves and the tampa bay lightning dealt a blow to toronto's playoff hopes with a 6-2 rout of the maple leafs on monday night.
document.title: ritola scores twice as lightning rout leafs, 6-2
lines_and_colors: mattias ritola scored twice, dwayne roloson made 30 saves and the tampa bay lightning dealt a blow to toronto's playoff hopes with a 6-2 rout of the maple leafs on monday night.
